content:
Hi there! Not sure if this already old news and somewhere in a ballot ticket, but I happened to look at the IG from SDOH-cc and encountered some issues:

  • There's a reference to an implementationguide-page that also Grahame can't explain.
  • Multiple links from the download page give a 404.
  • Googling the IG I was getting confused by many different links: http://build.fhir.org/ig/Gravity-SDOH/SDOH-CC/, http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-sdoh-cc/, http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-sdoh-clinicalcare/, http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/sdoh-cc/, https://build.fhir.org/ig/Park-Avenue-Capital-LLC-dba-MaxMD/SDOH-CC/, https://trifolia-fhir.lantanagroup.com/igs/lantana_hapi_r4/SDOH-CC/, https://github.com/HL7/sdoh-cc

Hope this can be of use!
Ping :point_up: Nevermind, the first two issues seem at least to have been resolved.
